body:
I was wondering if there is anyway of getting downloads of maps on Avicus for personal use.

I would personally like the Zao map download.
body_tagged:
I was wondering if there is anyway of getting downloads of maps on Avicus for personal use.

I would personally like the Zao map download.
title: Map Downloads?

replies.body:
You would need permission from the original creator.
So for Zao, you need to contact Astronis/Evocal.
Unless they've already stated it's open for download, in which case, just ask a Map Dev.
replies.body_tagged:
You would need permission from the original creator.
So for Zao, you need to contact Astronis/Evocal.
Unless they've already stated it's open for download, in which case, just ask a Map Dev.

replies.body: Even if I only want it for cinematics?
replies.body_tagged: Even if I only want it for cinematics?

reply_to.body:
You would need permission from the original creator.
So for Zao, you need to contact Astronis/Evocal.
Unless they've already stated it's open for download, in which case, just ask a Map Dev.

replies.body: The map developers have terms about this. Basically, just ask Astronis for the download but it's preferred to know what you need it for.
replies.body_tagged: The map developers have terms about this. Basically, just ask Astronis for the download but it's preferred to know what you need it for.

replies.body: I want to use it for cinematics in a video I am making/planning to make
replies.body_tagged: I want to use it for cinematics in a video I am making/planning to make

reply_to.body: The map developers have terms about this. Basically, just ask Astronis for the download but it's preferred to know what you need it for.
reply_to.body_tagged: The map developers have terms about this. Basically, just ask Astronis for the download but it's preferred to know what you need it for.

replies.body:
Alrighty, even though it's for a cinematic video, you do still need Astronis' permission to use the map. You can find his Skype on his profile: http://avicus.net/Astronis

Hope this helps :)

I'm going to go ahead and lock this to prevent further spam, good day!
